node.title: FIT & FREE! Building Brain and Body Health
node.description: Fit & free! is a one-of-a-kind lifestyle workshop that will empower you to share specialized presentations addressing clinical, lifestyle, mental, and spiritual health. In this seminar you will be introduced to dynamic new tools that will empower you to TEACH important topics and concepts relating to chronic disease, fitness, and brain health; DEMONSTRATE practical, balanced lifestyle principles for consistent healthful choices; MOTIVATE participants on how to nurture an internal mental environment to push through obstacles, addictions, and setbacks; and CONNECT others with God, teach special truths, and gain decisions for Christ.
